pages.text: The fullscreen worldmap is the main place to manage and interact with your map. You can access the main worldmap by pressing $(k:ftbchunks.map) or $(l)simply clicking the icon in the top left of your inventory.$(reset) In here you can access the options menu (the gear icon in the bottom left of your map screen), $(l:ftbchunks/ftbchunks_claiming)claim chunks and edit your allies$(reset) with the icons at the top left and $(l:ftbchunks/ftbchunks_waypoints)create waypoints$(reset).
